## getVersionNameFromId() function

Extracts and returns the version name of a version id e.g. getVersionNameFromId(VersionId(`versions.xyz.foo`<!-- -->)) = `xyz`

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getVersionNameFromId(id: VersionId): string
```
